page.title: 19TRANSPORT IN WEDMORE AREA
page.content: Most people in the area travel by car. {Public Transport:}The only public transport is a bus which goes to Wells. This service is poorly used and is in danger of being withdrawn. {Community Bus:}A community bus has been running for some years and collects people from their homes. It travels to shopping centres in Street, Bridgwater and Weston_Super_Mare. Those using it most are old age pensioners and those without cars. {Mobile Services:}Mobile services are well used and needed in this rural area, in particular a daily delivery of milk, the visit of the library van, fresh bread deliveries and the fish and chip round. Many people{walk or cycle}to the shops and for pleasure.
